productData.displayName: Apple Iphone XS 64 GB Space Grey
productData.longDescription:
Apple iPhone XS smartphone comes with a 5.8 inch full HD display for clear and vibrant visual experience on your phone. The 12 MP rear camera along with dual LED flash and a 7 MP front camera is useful for clicking memories that you can preserve with you. The phone also comes with a 256 GB of internal storage that you can use to store your media files and other products.

  • 12MP primary camera and 7MP front facing camera
  • You can now make hands-free calls to the US and Canada through your Google Home device
  • 14.73 centimeters (5.8-inch) capacitive touchscreen with 2436 x 1125 pixels resolution
  • iOs v12 operating system with 2.39GHz Apple A12 Bionic hexa core processor, 4GB RAM, 64GB internal memory expandable and and dual SIM dual-standby (4G+4G)
  • 2658mAH lithium-ion battery
  • 1 year manufacturer warranty for device and 6 months manufacturer warranty for in-box accessories including batteries from the date of purchase
